title: Last Minute PS5 Bets, Predictions - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.11.20
description:
It's a PS I Love You XOXO takeover! With just moments to go before the PS5 Reveal Event, Greg and Blessing make some bets, answer some questions, and try not to explode with excitement.  



Time Stamps - 

 00:00:00 - Start
00:05:20 - Housekeeping
IT’S A HUGE WEEK OF EVENTS
Today, Andy and Nick are streaming COD
We’re Live reacting to the PS5 event Thursday @ 1 pm on Twitch!
TLOU2 Review is Friday at 12:01 am pt!
Core Game Jam is Friday after KFGD!
The Kinda Funny Showcase is back, but it’s called the Guerilla Collective! We’ve teamed up with our friends at the Media Indie Exchange to do a three-day showcase featuring nearly 90 games! It all kicks off Saturday at it’s NEW START TIME of 9 am PT on twitch!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Conner Nolan, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:11:35 - Spider-Man 2 isn’t Isom’s next Game?
00:06:20 - PS5 BETS AND PREDICTIONS
00:29:00 -  - Best Friends Q:Frankfurtter
00:53:10 - Ps5 Prices were Bullshit, Joe Skrebbels @ IGN
00:55:52 - Sony Patents AI to take over for Ragequitters, Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:58:10 - Death Stranding X Half Life Content Teased
00:59:00 - Out today
01:03:55 - Squad Up:Mark Freeman (Zoom Twitter) - @theindieboy1
01:04:52 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Blessing
